author: Matthew Strauss
title: Ryan Adams Adds More World Tour Dates, Shows With Jenny Lewis

organizations.name: sc - north charleston performing arts center
alberta - southern alberta jubilee auditorium06-23 edmonton

text:
Ryan Adams Adds More World Tour Dates, Shows With Jenny Lewis He’s also got a new Beats 1 radio show, “The Midnight Wave” Ryan Adams Photo by Suzi Pratt/WireImage 
Ryan Adams has announced more tour dates behind his new album Prisoner (out now via Pax-Am / Blue Note ). The trek includes stops in the United States, Canada, Australia, and Europe. Jenny Lewis and Phoebe Bridgers join at various dates. See Adams’ full itinerary below. In addition to the tour, Adams has announced a new show on Apple Music’s Beats 1 radio. His program, “The Midnight Wave,” premieres Sunday, February 19 at 3 a.m. Eastern; it is set to air every other week. Watch a preview video for “The Midnight Wave” below.
